caption: Relating to the required disclosure of certain financial relationships in civil actions regarding the activities of United States defense contractors.
last_action: 04/14/2025 S Committee report printed and distributed: Apr 14 2025  3:13PM
summary: The bill requires claimants in civil actions against US defense contractors to disclose any funding or support received from sanctioned/embargoed nations. Chinese individuals or organizations may be impacted if China is under US sanctions, as they would need to disclose any financial connections when involved in lawsuits with defense contractors. Failure to disclose could result in case dismissal or delays.
translation: 该法案要求在针对美国国防承包商的民事诉讼中，原告必须披露是否收到来自受制裁/禁运国家的任何资金或支持。如果中国受到美国制裁，中国个人或组织在与国防承包商发生诉讼时可能受到影响，因为他们需要披露任何财务关联。未能披露可能导致案件被驳回或延迟。
